name: Bethesda Softworks Archive
summary: Learn about .BSA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BSA files are not meant to be altered, but they can be "modded" in order to change the gameplay. Various programs exist to unpack and alter BSA files.

description: Compressed game data archive used by Bethesda Softworks video games; contains 3d models, textures, sounds, and other data referenced by each game.
